moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: Eerie Impulse
moves.effect: Sharply lowers the target’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: A Surge of Power!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk and evasiveness.

syncMove.name: Surging Charge Beam
syncMove.description: The more the target’s Sp. Atk has been lowered, the greater the power of this move.

passives.name: Last Word
passives.description: The Pokémon uses Explosion immediately before fainting.
